description: Real LLM-generated fixtures for Phase 6 CLI testing

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Implement user authentication system (login, registration, password reset)

tasks.title: Implement Basic Project Management
tasks.description: Implement basic project creation and management features

tasks.title: Implement Task CRUD Operations
tasks.description: Implement simple task CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations

tasks.title: Develop Basic User Interface
tasks.description: Develop a basic user interface with responsive design

tasks.title: Implement Task Priority and Status
tasks.description: Implement task priority levels and status tracking

tasks.title: Implement Due Date Management
tasks.description: Implement due date management and notifications

tasks.title: Implement Task Assignment
tasks.description: Implement task assignment to team members

tasks.title: Implement Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Implement basic search and filtering capabilities

tasks.title: Implement Comment System
tasks.description: Implement a comment system for tasks and projects

tasks.title: Implement Real-time Updates
tasks.description: Implement real-time notifications and updates using WebSockets

tasks.title: Implement Team Management
tasks.description: Implement team member invitation and management

tasks.title: Implement Activity Feed
tasks.description: Implement an activity feed and audit trail

tasks.title: Develop Dashboard and Reporting
tasks.description: Develop a dashboard with analytics and reporting

tasks.title: Implement Task Dependencies and Templates
tasks.description: Implement task dependencies and project templates

tasks.title: Develop Mobile App/PWA
tasks.description: Develop a mobile app or PWA implementation

tasks_with_subtasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks_with_subtasks.description: Implement user authentication system (login, registration, password reset)

subtasks.title: Design User Authentication Database Schema
subtasks.description: Design the database schema for storing user authentication information, including fields for username, password (hashed), email, registration date, and password reset tokens.

subtasks.title: Implement User Registration API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint for user registration that accepts username, email, and password. Validate input, hash the password, and store the user in the database.

subtasks.title: Implement User Login API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint for user login that accepts username and password. Authenticate the user against the database and return a JSON Web Token (JWT) upon successful authentication.

subtasks.title: Implement Password Reset Request API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to handle password reset requests.  Generate a unique token, store it with the user ID and expiry timestamp, and send an email to the user with a link containing the token.

subtasks.title: Implement Password Reset API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint for resetting the password. It should validate the reset token, ensure it hasn't expired, and then update the user's password with the new password provided.  Invalidate the token after successful password reset.

subtasks.title: Implement User Authentication Middleware
subtasks.description: Create middleware to protect API endpoints that require authentication. Verify the JWT and attach the user object to the request.

subtasks.title: Implement Logout Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement an endpoint or mechanism for users to log out, invalidating their current session (e.g., by removing the refresh token cookie or blacklisting the JWT).

tasks_with_subtasks.title: Implement Basic Project Management
tasks_with_subtasks.description: Implement basic project creation and management features

subtasks.title: Design Project Data Model
subtasks.description: Design the database schema or data structures required to represent projects, tasks, and their relationships.

subtasks.title: Implement Project Creation Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint that allows users to create new projects.

subtasks.title: Implement Project Listing Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to retrieve a list of projects, with optional filtering and pagination.

subtasks.title: Implement Project Details Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to retrieve the details of a specific project.

subtasks.title: Implement Project Update Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to update existing project details.

subtasks.title: Implement Project Deletion Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to delete existing projects.

tasks_with_subtasks.title: Implement Task CRUD Operations
tasks_with_subtasks.description: Implement simple task CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations

subtasks.title: Define Task Data Model
subtasks.description: Define the structure and data types for the Task object, including fields like ID, title, description, status, priority, creation timestamp, and update timestamp.

subtasks.title: Implement Create Task Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to handle the creation of new tasks. This should include request validation and database persistence.

subtasks.title: Implement Read Task Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to retrieve a task by its ID.

subtasks.title: Implement Update Task Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to update an existing task by its ID.

subtasks.title: Implement Delete Task Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create an API endpoint to delete a task by its ID.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling
subtasks.description: Implement proper error handling for all CRUD operations, including logging and appropriate error responses.

subtasks.title: Write Integration Tests
subtasks.description: Write integration tests to verify that all CRUD operations work correctly together.
